channel.title: CVE Feed for Hitachi Solutions, Ltd. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hitachi Solutions, Ltd. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-10863|2024-08-05T17:50:12.541Z -- hitachi%20solutions%2C%20ltd. -- hibun%20confidential%20file%20decryption%20program
item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in HIBUN Confidential File Decryption program prior to 10.50.0.5 allows an attacker to gain privileges via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory. Note this is a separate vulnerability from CVE-2017-10865.

item.title: CVE-2017-10864|2024-08-05T17:50:12.522Z -- hitachi%20solutions%2C%20ltd. -- installer%20of%20hibun%20confidential%20file%20viewer
item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in Installer of HIBUN Confidential File Viewer prior to 11.20.0001 allows an attacker to gain privileges via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory.

item.title: CVE-2017-10865|2024-08-05T17:50:12.499Z -- hitachi%20solutions%2C%20ltd. -- hibun%20confidential%20file%20decryption%20program
item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in HIBUN Confidential File Decryption program prior to 10.50.0.5 allows an attacker to gain privileges via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory. Note this is a separate vulnerability from CVE-2017-10863.
